nodes.title: Fixed typo in HtmlContentHandlerTest test case
Better memory management when reading the data from server and enforcing maxBytes
Add a few methods to the controller to support grabbing crawl metrics
Updates .gitignore for Maven / IntelliJ & Pom Readability Improvements
Make the various shutdown delays configurable
Update frontier - add method to grab number of scheduled pages
Append spaces to textual content parsing of HTML
addresses #141 in order to apply politeness correctly for different hosts
Began work on an asynchronous crawling
tidy up the environment, try to shutdown more BerkleyDB threads
Record the URLs of Sitemaps found within robots.txt files
Textual content parsing of HTML doesn't have enough spaces between tags.
dont throw NPE if Content-Type is missing
subclasses of WebCrawler should be able to change the parser
Create CrawlerConfigurationException Specialization. Avoid throw Exception.
Adapted Robotstxtparser in order to fix #107
Making Maximum Download URL Sequentially configurable
Allow URLCanonicalizer to handle multiple values for a single query param key
When checking robots.txt directive user agent against crawler user agent use lowercase.
allow parsing script tag and other html tags
Attempt to use already closed Environment object when shutting down crawl controller explicitly
The canonicalization of request URLs alphabetizes the parameters
The canonicalization of request URLs alphabetizes the parameters
Load robots.txt at the root of the complete url first. It's useful fo…
Add the ability to choose a URLTransformer and not forced to stick wi…
Canonical URL meta tag handling and AJAX crawling
refactored some fields from private to protected to make it possible …
Accept and parse 2xx status codes, instead of just 200
Fix for issue #52 - Close entity when page is to big
Add onUnhandledException callback to handle unhandled exceptions during fetching
Allow crawler to keep running with an empty queue
Allow to differentiate between queue sizes in Frontier
Also notify waiting lists when a single URL has been schedules, instead
Added patch to allow to clear out the DocIDServer
Fix bug where metaRefresh was used instead of metaLocation
DB-transaction after removing processed pages is not committed
Added a factory for instantiation of WebCrawler in CrawlController
Change user agent to reflect new hosting location
encode halfwidth and fullwidth space before URI create.
Add type safety to custom data
Provide factory method for creating the HttpUriRequest (default: HttpGet...
make the magic number 100 to be a final variable.
remove the magic number in Frontier, make it configurable
change database name from string literal to a static final variable DATA...
Update README to use Set for getOutgoingUrls()
add jetty server response some info
Fix processing of backslashes in a path
Base clases provide more protected methods for subclasses
No DocIDs will be created if maxPagesToFetch is reached (most times).
Switch Travis builds from oraclejdk8 to openjdk8
Extracted interfaces from Parser and PageFetcher
Update the maximum size of a robots.txt file
Method visibility for overriding classes and basic POST capabilities
Fix for #134, prevent NPE in getNumberOfAssignedPages.
Revert "#343, event when redirect to nothing."
TLDList updates -- non-singleton, and use third party public suffix list libraries
make the batch read transaction size configurable
Update example URLs to use https instead of http
Update ASF 2.0 license per Apache current guidelines
make the postgres tests easier to run on Windows
add missing package spec for RobotstxtParserTest.groovy
Corrected parsing process problems with HTML entities such as ö
Fix issues of NullPointerException when frontier/ is empty
Fix issue of NullPointerException when frontier/ not found.
Parse css for links matching url(*)in tags @import and @font-face
CookieStore access and minor clean up
Use dynamic port for WireMock in unit tests
Apply politeness delay only if it's set
Fix collision when both HTTPS and authentication are enabled (fix #142)
Added binary content crawling config in readme
Add support for custom dns resolver, test.
Updates Groovy / Tika & Lighten external Tika Dependencies
remove reduplicate method invoke getLastHeader("Content-length") in PageFetcher
fix page parse charset, if parse charset failed then use default utf8;
Permit the HTTP client RequestConfig obj to be customized
Add processing of meta robots flags and rel="nofollow"
